questions.question: The living room .............................. now.
questions.description: We make the passive form of the present continuous tense with is/am/are + being + past participle.

questions.question: The Olympic Games .............................. every four years.
questions.description: They hold the Olympic Games every four years. The Olympic Games are held every four years. The passive form in the simple present tense is made with is/am/are + past participle.

questions.question: The patient ............................... on yesterday.
questions.description: The passive form of the simple past tense is made with was/were + past participle.

questions.question: By the end of this week, the roof .............................
questions.description: They will repair the roof / The roof will be repaired.

questions.question: Criminals .................................. before they commit crimes.
questions.description: Criminals will not stop. They should be stopped. The passive form of should stop is should be stopped.

questions.question: I .................................. by the aroma of the freshly baked cookies.
questions.description: The passive form of tempted is was tempted.

questions.question: He .............................. to an uninhabited island.
questions.description: They deported him. He was deported.

questions.question: The suspect .................................. by the police.
questions.description: The police are interrogating the suspect. / The suspect is being interrogated by the police.

questions.question: The old building ................................. by the municipal authorities.
I ............................... to study physics at university.
questions.description: They encouraged me. / I was encouraged.
